T02D3362:39b-1: a'arya badzra sva ra sva t'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3362:39b-3: 'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D3362:40a-0: 'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal @40a * //
T02D3362:40a-2: / yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsung gter yon
T02D3362:40a-3: tan rang bzhin rdo rje dbyangs can la btud nas
T02D3362:40a-4: // rang la mnyes byed phan mdzad mdzes pa'i rol
T02D3362:40a-5: ldan spro zhing rtsod pas thub par dka' mdzad ma
T02D3362:40a-6: // // de ni yang dag mnyes byed phan phyir
T02D3362:40a-7: srid pa byed cing mi bzad mi shes mun pa
T02D3362:40a-8: // // 'joms // blo ngan ngag gi ched du
T02D3362:40a-9: sems can phan phyir legs par gsungs pa'i cho ga
T02D3362:40a-11: snga bar kha la sogs pa dag pa'i rang bzhin
T02D3362:40a-12: snying rje dang ldan bzod ldan pas //
T02D3362:40a-13: sngags pas gtsang ma'i stan la byams pa'i dga' bas myos shing gang zhig dga' ba dag gis ni //
T02D3362:40a-14: yid dang mthun pa'i dben pa'i gnas su yang ni dga' bas rang gi snying gar padma blta //
T02D3362:40a-15: de 'dir sprul par brjod pa'i ri bong 'dzin pa la ni yang dag bsgom bya de la yang //
T02D3362:40a-16: de nas do:yi 'od zer gyis ni 'di nas kyang ni phyogs gzhan kun ni yongs su bkang //
T02D3362:40a-17: sangs rgyas tshogs ni kun du bltas la mchod pa la sogs 'di ni bsgom par rab tu bya //
T02D3362:40a-18: me tog la sogs de nas phyag byas 'dir ni sdig pa bshags pa de bzhin rab tu bya //
T02D3362:40a-19: sngags rig pas ni bsod nams rjes su yi rang skyabs gsum yang dag rab tu 'gro bar bya //
T02D3362:40a-20: shes bya la sogs smon lam legs btab de yis bdag nyid kyis ni dmigs par rab tu bya //
T02D3362:40a-21: gcig dang du ma dang bral lta bur yongs brjod ba den zhing dag par shes rtogs pas //
T02D3362:40a-22: de nas sna tshogs thams cad rnam rtog dra ba ma lus stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya //
T02D3362:40a-23: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3362:40a-24: stong nyid las byung padma dang ni zla ba la gnas yang ni do:yig dmar po ste //
T02D3362:40a-25: sna tshogs dag gi 'od zer tshogs ni shin tu mdzes par gyur pa'i padma 'dab brgyad pa //
T02D3362:40a-26: de las dmar zhing 'od zer chen po dang ldan bcom ldan 'das ma bzang po'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D3362:40a-27: g-yon brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis yang dag gnas shing zhal gsum phyag drug dag gis rab brgyan pa //
T02D3362:40a-28: g-yas pa'i zhal ni sngo zhing phyag na padma ral gri gri gug rab tu bsnams pa ste //
T02D3362:40a-29: zhal g-yon dkar zhing lhung bzed dang bcas de bzhin rin chen 'khor lor rab tu ldan pa'i phyag //
T02D3362:40b-0: snying gar padma la gnas zla ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i 'bar @40b ba'i do:yig de dang ni //
T02D3362:40b-1: sna tshogs mi shes mun pa 'joms pa'i 'od zer gyis ni 'gro ba ma lus rab tu 'gengs //
T02D3362:40b-2: yang dag bsdus la rang gi snying gar zla bar
T02D3362:40b-3: gnas pa'i sa bon la gnas bltas la yang ni
T02D3362:40b-4: spro // de nyid yang dang yang du rgyun du
T02D3362:40b-5: snyom las med par nyin re bsam par rab byas
T02D3362:40b-6: spro // te ; / bsam gtan skyo na sa
T02D3362:40b-7: bon mnyam skyes bsdus la sngags 'di yi ni bzlas
T02D3362:40b-9: do shal g-yo zhing gsal ba'i rim pas 'byung bas yid bzhin du ni sngags kyi bzlas pa bya /
T02D3362:40b-10: aom pi tsu pi tsu pradzny'a wardha ni dzva la dzva la me dh'a bardha ni /
T02D3362:40b-12: budhi war dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3362:40b-13: thun mtshams thams cad du ni lha mo'i gzugs la yid kyis rtag par shin tu rab dga' bas //
T02D3362:40b-14: yang dag gsungs pa'i cho gas sems can don gyi rgyur ni sngags 'di yongs su bzlas pa bya //
T02D3362:40b-15: bsod nams bsngo bya dgos pas byed na bsam gtan rtse gcig nges par gnas pas bskyang bya ste //
T02D3362:40b-16: ji srid 'bum phrag yongs su ma rdzogs pa ni rdzogs 'gyur nas ni las kyi rim bzhin bya //
T02D3362:40b-17: rnam pa thams cad du ni mi mthun phyogs su nye bar song yang de nyid bsam gtan byed //
T02D3362:40b-18: dkar po'i tshes gcig nyid nas shin tu mdzes pa'i yid kyis ji srid zla ba gnas pa'i bar //
T02D3362:40b-19: de snyed sbyar ba'i skad cig nub re bzhin du ji snyed zla ba nya ba'i bar du bya //
T02D3362:40b-20: de nyid kyi ni nub mo thub par dka' ba'i tshigs bcad mkhan gyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D3362:40b-21: gang zhig dpal ldan nag po'i rgyal pos dpal ldan gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud du gnas byas pa //
T02D3362:40b-22: dpal dang ldan pa'i rdo rje dbyangs can bcom ldan 'das ma de ni yang dag mnyes pa'i thabs //
T02D3362:40b-23: sems can rnams la phan pa'i don du bdag gis byas pa'i bsod nams yang dag gyur pa des //
T02D3362:40b-24: des ni 'gro kun nag po lta bur thub par
T02D3362:40b-25: dka' ba'i tshigs bcad mkhan ni grub par shog /
T02D3362:40b-27: dpal ldan rdo rje dbyangs can gyi //
T02D3362:40b-28: 'joms byed mthar ni byed pa yi //
T02D3362:40b-29: sgrub pa'i thabs ni 'di byas so //
T02D3362:40b-30: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D3362:40b-31: slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02D3362:40b-32: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
